Na RM Agro, estamos comprometidos em dis: At RM Agro, we're committed to spreading and balancing market knowledge in agribusiness sectors. Founded in September 2023 by Rodrigo Novaes and Mateus Brizueña, our company emerged from the perception of a market gap.

Conheça Rodrigo Novaes, o CO-fundador da: Meet Rodrigo Novaes, co-founder of RM Agro. With a degree in Business Administration and logistics expertise, Rodrigo has over two decades of experience in the Brazilian agricultural supply chain. Born in Minas Gerais, he moved to Mato Grosso at 16 and joined a renowned multinational company at 18, starting his agribusiness journey.
Desde então, sua vida foi marcada por di: Since then, his life has been marked by many challenges, being away from his family and working in all regions of Brazil, from North to South. Strengthening his technical expertise on the specifics of each logistical corridor and improving his knowledge of various harvests in the country, Rodrigo developed a deep understanding of the agribusiness sector.
Todas essas experiências, aliadas a um f: All these experiences, combined with a strong innovative desire, inspired him to dream of bringing strategies to the market that produce results in operational management and a better understanding of the industry. His goal is to establish the RM Agro name as a driver of strategic thinking in agribusiness transportation, shaping the future of agricultural logistics in Brazil.
Conheça Mateus Brizueña, co-fundador da: Meet Mateus Brizueña, co-founder of RM Agro. An Agricultural Technician and Agronomist, he has over a decade of experience in risk management and commercial operations of soybeans, corn, agricultural inputs, biofuels, and petroleum derivatives. Starting his career as a grain classifier, he became a Commodity Trader, actively working on building derivative and risk desks in three major companies at the national and international levels.
Sua ligação com o agronegócio vem desde: His connection to agribusiness dates back to childhood, influenced by a family already involved in the sector. For Mateus, agribusiness is not just a field of work but a way of life. His aspirations, relationships, and dedication are all intertwined with agribusiness.
Dentro da RM Agro, sua atuação vai além: Within RM Agro, his role goes beyond executive functions, directly contributing to strategy formulation and maintaining close relationships with clients.
Fora do escritório, considera-se um home: Outside the office, he considers himself a simple man who values time spent with friends. For him, building strong relationships is as important as any commercial transaction, and this is what motivates him to continue in agribusiness.
A RM Agro é uma empresa pioneira na gest: RM Agro is a pioneering company in agribusiness risk management. Providing consulting and specialized training, it is revolutionizing the industry with its commitment and professionalism in the transportation, fuel, and agricultural sectors.
Nossa empresa vai além de simplesmente o: Our company goes beyond just offering consulting. We want to be true partners with our clients, helping them grow efficiently and without risk, says one of the company's founders.
Com valores centrados na excelência, pro: With values centered on excellence, professionalism, ethics, innovation, and sustainability, RM Agro aims not only to lead the market but also to positively impact agribusiness.
